long_description: With distinctive mesh panels for breathable comfort, the Roxy Marathon T-Shirt for women does all the moisture-wicking work of a performance shirt and adds a splash of color to your wardrobe. Lightweight fabric wicks moisture, and extended cuffs with thumbholes warm wrists. Flat seams eliminate chafing during your run. The Roxy Marathon T-Shirt for women features a reflective logo at back neck and a dropped back hem for ceverage.
short_description: With distinctive mesh panels for breathable comfort, the Roxy Marathon T-Shirt for women does all the moisture-wicking work of a performance shirt and adds a splash of color to your wardrobe.
